title: Continue blending of 6 pc imported coal till June: Power Min to power plants
description: To meet the projected peak power demand of 250 GW in summer, the power ministry has directed domestic coal-based thermal power plants to blend six per cent of imported coal until June 2024. This is due to supply issues, rising demand, logistics issues, and the need to maintain adequate coal reserves in DCB plants.
